item.title: Korasi feezes client[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

I added the models in my client, then added the ints in itemDef class. When I go in-game and spawn it the client freezes

case 13350: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 57784; itemDef.modelZoom = 1400; itemDef.modelRotationY = 700; itemDef.modelRotationX = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 25; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 60; itemDef.anInt165 = 57780; //male wield model itemDef.anInt200 = 57780; //femArmModel itemDef.name = "Korasi's sword"; itemDef.description = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes();//examine. break;

24lo8r9.jpg1391×543
